page.title: 16LOCAL TRADE IN WEST WICKHAM
page.content: {Shops and Pubs:-}This small village owns 1 quaint little shop cum post office. It is nothing more than the front room of a house. The only public house, the White Horse was completely renovated and reopened under new management just a few weeks ago.They also provide meals. One lady sells fruit and vegetables from her house and a local man sells his own woodcraft articles from his house. {Businesses:-}There are several self- employed builders, plumbers etc. in the village and there is a small electronic design industry (in the redundant school house) but it doesn't as yet employ any local people.{ {Deliveries:-}Baker,fishmonger,butcher, milk and papers-none by local traders. {LOCAL TRADE IN WESTON GREEN}- This village has the same mobile deliveries and one Post Office cum shop.
